title: Accountant / Tax Preparer
job_overview:
Job Title: Accountant / Tax Preparer
Location: Remote
Schedule: Monday to Friday - 9am - 5pm EST
Salary: TBD during initial interview

Job Summary:
We are currently seeking an experienced Accountant / Tax Preparer who is proficient in preparing Federal and State tax returns (Forms 1040, 1065, 1120S) along with all related schedules. This role requires someone with strong bookkeeping skills and hands-on experience with both UltraTax and QuickBooks (Online/Desktop).

Responsibilities:
Prepare and file federal and state tax returns (Forms 1040, 1065, 1120S)
Complete all related federal and state schedules accurately and efficiently
Perform bookkeeping and write-up work using QuickBooks Online and Desktop
Ensure all documentation and entries are compliant with accounting standards
Collaborate with the team to meet deadlines and client needs

Essential Qualifications: 
3–5 years of proven experience in tax preparation and bookkeeping
Strong command of UltraTax software (required)
Proficiency in QuickBooks and Microsoft Excel
Ability to produce accurate, high-quality work independently
Detail-oriented with a strong work ethic

(Only qualified applicants will be contacted)

How to apply:
Please submit your resume to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line “ATPVA - [Your Name]”
